
                            
                            <p>打开“中国电信”APP，在【我】页面点右上角【我的奖券】进去点右上角【口令兑换】填写口令【草长莺飞】再手动领取就会到账，数量限量 <br> ——— <br> 口令：草长莺飞<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/28/150231ywrrhyipml5cqhrp.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/28/150231ywrrhyipml5cqhrp.png"> <br> </p>
